patthana23.58:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana23.58:1.1_0: if he doesn’t take pleasure in the open, he’s not the teaching on the support of the teachings. He has no cause or condition for the teachings.
patthana23.58:2.1_0: They don’t memorize the teaching for the instruction.
patthana23.58:3.1_0: Without relying on the formless teaching, they don’t rely on the support, and a cause as a reason.
patthana23.58:4.1_0: Not based on to a duality of health, he doesn’t give rise to a thought of harming. Existence is a cause of gaining cause.
patthana23.58:5.1_0: (This should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
